title: March: The Atonement of Jesus Christ
short_title: March: The Atonement of Jesus Christ
content: March: The Atonement of Jesus Christ
”Behold I say unto you that ye shall have hope through the atonement of Christ“ (
The outlines in this unit will help the young men “come unto Christ … and partake of his salvation, and the power of his redemption” (

). In this unit you can help them understand how, through repentance and the Atonement, they can remain clean and worthy to fulfill their priesthood duties. You can also help them recognize that as Aaronic Priesthood holders, they have a sacred role in helping others receive the blessings of the Atonement as they administer the ordinances of the sacrament and baptism.
To make Duty to God part of the Sunday quorum meeting, you may consider teaching the Duty to God outline below during this unit.
Outlines to choose from this month:
How do I help others receive the blessings of the Atonement? (Duty to God)
What is the Atonement of Jesus Christ?
What does it mean to have faith in Jesus Christ?
What does it mean to repent?
Why do I need to forgive others?
How can the Atonement help me during my trials?

Many of the lesson topics and learning activities in this unit would work well as Mutual activities. Work with quorum presidencies in selecting and planning appropriate activities to reinforce what the young men learn on Sunday.
